title: UI: Approve/Reject actions
description:
Action buttons in detail panel for ticks awaiting human:
- Approve button (green) - calls POST /api/ticks/:id/approve
- Reject button (red) - opens feedback modal
- Feedback modal: textarea + submit
- htmx for async updates
- Success/error toast notifications
- Card moves to new column on success

AGENT VERIFICATION:
- Use agent-browser to open a tick in 'Needs Review' column
- Click Approve, verify card moves to Done
- Open another tick, click Reject
- Enter feedback, submit
- Verify card moves to Rejected column
- Take screenshot of each step

HUMAN REVIEW:
- URL: http://localhost:3000
- Test approve flow on a real tick
- Test reject flow with feedback
- Verify feedback appears in notes
